body.en:
{greeting}

Thanks for reaching out! This is aInbox Feedback — we collect and forward feedback to the team.

To share feedback, just send an email to feedback@ainbox.io describing your experience, suggestion, or issue.

Looking for other aInbox features? Forward any email to summary@ainbox.io for a summary, or draft@ainbox.io for help writing a reply.

— aInbox Feedback
body.zh:
{greeting}

感谢联系！这里是 aInbox 反馈 — 我们收集并转发反馈给团队。

要分享反馈，只需发送邮件到 feedback@ainbox.io，描述您的体验、建议或问题。

需要其他 aInbox 功能？将邮件转发到 summary@ainbox.io 获取摘要，或发送到 draft@ainbox.io 获取写作帮助。

— aInbox Feedback
